document_title: Right testicular pain: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: dau-tinh-hoan-ben-phai.json_3_How dangerous is right testicle pain?
subsection_content: Most cases of right testicular pain can be treated successfully. However, if the pain is caused by infection, testicular torsion, etc., without timely medical intervention, there is a risk of permanent damage to the organ. This can seriously affect fertility, even cause necrosis, spreading throughout the body and threatening life. (3)
subsection_title: dau tinh hoan ben phai.json. How dangerous is right testicle pain?
subsection_data:
dau tinh hoan ben phai.json. How dangerous is right testicle pain?
Most cases of right testicular pain can be treated successfully. However, if the pain is caused by infection, testicular torsion, etc., without timely medical intervention, there is a risk of permanent damage to the organ. This can seriously affect fertility, even cause necrosis, spreading throughout the body and threatening life. (3)
